title: encoding/json inprecise documentation for Marshall
body:
In the documentation for Marshal in encoding/json it states:

The "string" option signals that a field is stored as JSON inside a JSON-encoded string. It applies only to fields of **string, floating point, or integer types**. 

http://golang.org/pkg/encoding/json/#Marshal

It appears the tag also works for *bool* types, as verified by the TestStringTag in encode_test.go
